meaningMnemonic: When climbing a <radical>tree</radical> in <radical>public</radical>, it’s best to choose a <kanji>pine</kanji>. Pine trees offer the most coverage, so you’ll be able to hide, even out in public.
readingMnemonic: In case you fall, someone has laid <reading>mats</reading> (まつ) out around the base of the <kanji>pine</kanji> tree. That way, you’ll land on the mats should something unfortunate happen.
